Tobi Sakatoi

About

Born in Chicago 1999, as a rogue deviant, always causing chaos in its wake.

"Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who forge them." - DND

Grew up in the village of White Lake, WI. I am a Linux enthusiast and also a proud mother of three kids and a chonky cat. I mostly use Arch Linux on a daily basis, as it is my preferred flavour of Linux.
